messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
We're in here.
911, what's the location of your emergency?
Yes, we're at Macy's in the town center. We think we have a shooter in the store.
Okay, do you know if anybody's injured?
We don't know. All we hear are shots and people are screaming and running.
Is it on the upper level or lower level?
Upper level. I don't know where the shots are coming from.
Okay, hold on. We're getting help started.
Right.
We've got help on the way, okay?
I know. We've got him on the way. Thank you. Bye.
9-1-1, what's the location of your emergency?
Hi. I'm at the town center, there's been a shooting.
Okay. I need you to get to a safe location. We have help on the way, okay?
Okay. Thank you.
9-1-1, what's the location of your emergency?
This is a shooting. We're at the town center, at Macy's upstairs, by the fragrance section.
Who is shot?
I don't know. I'm hiding underneath a register.
My partner is dispatching help while we’re talking. Whereabouts in Macy's do you think the shooter is?
Um, it's got to be upstairs around the food court. All the alarms are going off.
Grace, where are you? Hey!
Hold on just a moment.
Greene!
Sir? Did you actually see this or are you just hearing this?
No, no. We just heard it. There were like 15-20 gunshots right outside the entrance to Macy's upstairs.
Okay, I'm going to disconnect with you as they're already being dispatched. They're on the way.
Thank you. Bye.
9-1-1, what's the location of your emergency?
Clackamas Town Center, Frederick's of Hollywood. There's a fire in the mall.
Okay, they're on their way. Thank you.
Thank you.
9-1-1, what's the location of your emergency?
Hi, I'm in the back of Macy's. There’s a shooting.
Did you see the shooter?
No, we’re in the store. It's either inside or right outside Macy's.
Okay, we're getting people there as quickly as we can. Get yourself to a safe spot.
All right, thanks.
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hi, there's a shooting at the town center.
Did you actually witness the suspect or do you know where they are?
No, I don't. I'm inside Jamba Juice.
Okay, I'm going to disconnect with you. They've already got the call.
Okay, thank you.
9-1-1, are you reporting a shooting at the town center?
Yes, I am.
Okay, are you involved or do you see where the person is?
I'm in Bath & Body Works right now.
Do you see where the shooter is?
No.
Okay, I'm going to disconnect with you. They've already got the call.
9-1-1, are you calling about the shooting at the town center?
Yes.
Do you know where the shooter is?
They're over by the food court.
Top floor or bottom floor?
I don't know. We're just hearing shots.
Okay, find somewhere safe.
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hey, we have a report of a shooting at Clackamas Town Center.
Where at?
It's in Nordstrom right now. Someone is walking around with a gun.
Okay, how many people with a gun?
As far as I can see, one.
How many people has he shot?
I don't know right now. I'm in the store still and can just barely see him.
Is there any description of him?
I can't see right now.
What kind of gun does he have? Handgun or rifle?
Yes, it's a rifle.
Bye.
